// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`

//
// buf[0] = 13
// buf[1] = 12
//
// // console.log(buf.toString())
//
//
// const fs = require('fs')
//
// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`
//
// let buf = new Buffer(5);
//
// buf[0] = 13
// buf[1] = 12
//
// // console.log(buf.toString())
//
//
// const fs = require('fs')
//
// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })

// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

    console.log('读取结束');

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`

// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`

//
// buf[0] = 13
// buf[1] = 12
//
// // console.log(buf.toString())
//
//
// const fs = require('fs')
//
// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`
//
// let buf = new Buffer(5);
//
// buf[0] = 13
// buf[1] = 12
//
// // console.log(buf.toString())
//
//
// const fs = require('fs')
//
// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })

// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

    console.log('读取结束');

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`

// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`

//
// buf[0] = 13
// buf[1] = 12
//
// // console.log(buf.toString())
//
//
// const fs = require('fs')
//
// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`
//
// let buf = new Buffer(5);
//
// buf[0] = 13
// buf[1] = 12
//
// // console.log(buf.toString())
//
//
// const fs = require('fs')
//
// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })

// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

    console.log('读取结束');

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`

// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`

//
// buf[0] = 13
// buf[1] = 12
//
// // console.log(buf.toString())
//
//
// const fs = require('fs')
//
// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`
//
// let buf = new Buffer(5);
//
// buf[0] = 13
// buf[1] = 12
//
// // console.log(buf.toString())
//
//
// const fs = require('fs')
//
// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })

// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

    console.log('读取结束');

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`

// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`

//
// buf[0] = 13
// buf[1] = 12
//
// // console.log(buf.toString())
//
//
// const fs = require('fs')
//
// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`
//
// let buf = new Buffer(5);
//
// buf[0] = 13
// buf[1] = 12
//
// // console.log(buf.toString())
//
//
// const fs = require('fs')
//
// const rs = fs.createReadStream('./stream.txt');
// const ws = fs.createWriteStream('./stream1.txt');
//
// // rf.pipe(ws);
//
//
// let totalLength = 0;
// fs.stat('./stream.txt', (err,stats)=>{
//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })

// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

    console.log('读取结束');

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})

//     totalLength = stats.size;
// })
//
// let currentLength = 0;
//
// rs.on('data', (chunk)=>{
//     currentLength += chunk.length;
//     let rate = currentLength / totalLength
//     console.log(rate)
// })
//
// rs.on('end', ()=>{
//     console.log('结束了')
// })


const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
undefined// `use strict`

const fs = require('fs');

let rf = fs.createReadStream('./03.buffer.js');
let wf = fs.createWriteStream('./buffer.txt');
// rf.pipe(wf); 针对小文件

let data;

rf.on('data',(chunk)=>{
    data += chunk;
});


rf.on('end',()=>{
    wf.write(data);
    console.log('读取结束');
})
